about_the_game:
Space Tales is a real-time strategy game set in a retro-futuristic environment. Take on the role of a commander in the Intergalactic Planetary Expansion (I.P.E.) and immerse yourself in a thrilling mission to explore and conquer new planets, pushing the boundaries of the Human Empire.

This is an Demo of Space Tales, in Alpha. We're looking forward to receiving your feedback - we need you to make Space Tales great!

content_descriptors.notes: The story in our game is almost a satyre of imperialism/colonialism - and propaganda that usually goes with it. The player follows the order of a tyrannical regime, without knowing this regime is indeed tyrannical. The player will be sent to many different planets to "pacify" them - which is a polite way of saying "eradicating all lifeforms" - in order to make it ready for the next colony of Humans.

This is an Demo of Space Tales, in Alpha. We're looking forward to receiving your feedback - we need you to make Space Tales great!
